attributes.additional_details: why do we still have to contribute so much money to the eu ,and why so much money to third world help whilst we have so many financial probs in the uk .plus to save the nhs more expense,why doesnt the gov introduce a min contibution to every one from pay and benefits of say amin £2 per week that would incude the 7.5ml imgrants that live here now would not object to raising nhs funds this way so how about it
